title: State of Decay RePack By R.G Mechanics NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:
Year : 2013
Genre : Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer : Undead Labs
Publisher : Microsoft
Publication Type : RePack
Language : ENG|RUS
Voice language :RUS
Tablet : Ketaysy (ali213)

System requirements:
 Operating system : Windows XP (SP3), Windows Vista (SP2), Windows 7
 Processor : Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz (E6600) / Athlon X64 3400
 RAM : 2 GB
 Video Card : Radeon HD 2600 XT / GeForce 9600 GSO / Intel HD 3000
 Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0
 Free space on hard disk : 5 GB

Description :
  Apocalypse is coming. World will never be the same again on the earth mother came all the zombies. Leaving only you and a handful of brave men. This third-person shooter, which the unfolding events in the open game world with a rapidly changing environment. To survive, you need to pull together and start building a new life. Break camp and make of it an impregnable fortress. Produce food and weapons, making daring raids, rescue other survivors and enjoy the benefits of their unique talents.
